sub_title: Future-proof yourself. Find your authentic, original writer’s voice and tell YOUR story, in an Amsterdam Writers workshop.
summary:
Australian-born writer / copywriter / screenwriter based in Amsterdam. With over 20 years of experience in advertising, film and cross-media design, I've learned a multitude of skills. And at Amsterdam Writers, I share those skills with you by leading three different workshops: Writers' Stretch & Tone, Storytelling for Academics, and Elements of Screenwriting.

My writing has appeared in publications including The Guardian, Time Out, Blume Illustrated, and Fantastic Man, and is upcoming in Wordpeace. My client list includes WWF, Deloitte, Amazon Prime Video, Emirates, Gucci, Sony Computer Entertainment, Dopper, Philips, VW, Warner Bros., Ralph Lauren, Akzo Nobel, Macy’s, Shell, Accenture, Greenpeace, Heineken, Time Warner, Cuba Travel Network and Comedy Central.

I enjoy nothing more than helping general writers, academics, and businesses/organisations find the right words to to tell your stories the way you want to tell them; so that you actually reach your audience of followers, readers, or customers.

Can't find the right words? Here are two you could try: 

CALL MATTHEW  
+31 6 14 29 74 62
